views.markdown: Makes GitHub website more accessible on iOS 16.3 and lower by injecting JS and CSS with unsupported syntax removed.
- Updated JS for the recent GitHub changes

- Fixed some broken elements in the issues page on iOS < 15.4
- Made the JS code injected only once
- Fixed GitHub website crashing in some pages

- Fixed commit description and time not being displayed on iOS < 16.4
- Fixed some broken control elements on iOS < 15.4
- Minified CSS code before injecting
- Made JS code loaded from files
